nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 2 is the second issue in the Star Wars Adventures series of comics aimed at the "next generation of comic book fans." It was released on September 20, 2017 by IDW Publishing.
Rey is forced to save the life of the unpleasant Unkar Plutt! Will she be able to outwit the off-worlders who have captured him?
Rey encounters a tough new enemy that may change the course of her life forever! Meanwhile, Yoda recounts a very bizarre story from his youth!

The Tales of Wild Space comic was originally to be one about Yoda recounting a story from his youth, as seen in the solicitation. However, the actual story, "The Flat Mountain of Yavin," is about Evaan Verlaine, a character introduced in the Star Wars: Princess Leia comic, written by Mark Waid with art by Terry Dodson, published by Marvel Comics.
